amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that independent contractors are eligible for security clearances for purposes of employment to handle cyber threat intelligence and cyber threat information.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-41 to clarify that independent contractors are eligible for security clearances for purposes of employment to handle cyber threat intelligence and cyber threat information.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Schneider.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
